comment.author: 61849735@N00
comment._content: My father was in the US Army Cavalry in the early 30's.  He was a cook.  I have his cookbook.  It talks about building a field kitchen and ovens.  I wonder if this is the sort of thing he was doing.  Much of the US Army stayed in WWI mode until the late '30's and early '40's build up to WWII.
